abstract: Local prosecutor Chrissy T Adams will not charge Seneca, SC, Police Officer Mark Tiller, who fatally shot 19-year-old Zachary Hammond during attempted drug arrest in July; case has drawn anger partly because autopsy indicated Hammond, who was unarmed, had been shot from side and back.
lead_paragraph: A prosecutor in South Carolina said Tuesday that she would not bring charges against a police lieutenant who fatally shot a 19-year-old man during an attempted drug arrest in July.

headline.main: State Will Not Charge South Carolina Officer Who Killed Zachary Hammond
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Prosecutor Will Not Charge Officer Who Shot Young Driver

snippet: A prosecutor in South Carolina said Tuesday that she would not bring charges against a police lieutenant who fatally shot a 19-year-old man during an attempted drug arrest in July.
